title: (x) Absolut Vodka - Futura Cd {Yves}
content:
\>\>anyone knows the font name of absolut vodka... where i found it? thanks...

 [‹ (x) Dieselverkstaden - Myriad Cd {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605054937/http:/www.typophile.com/node/3787 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Locos Deli main type - Conga Brava {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605054937/http:/www.typophile.com/node/3772 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jmendesign

comments.content:
I think it's a Futura XBd Cd or something like that.   
Lemmecheck...

Sure looks like [Futura Condensed Extra Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605054937/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/futura/condensed-extra-black/testdrive.html?s=ABSOLUT%20LEGAL&p=72). Here's the [original](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605054937/http:/absolut.com/).
